items.sentence: Tom said that he thought Mary was hesitant to do that.
I was surprised when I heard somebody calling my name.
Tom was eating an apple, and Mary was eating a banana.
How long are you going to sleep, Tom? It's already 11.
Tom is on the verge of a breakthrough in his research.
Tom told the police he had been attacked by three men.
I don't think something like that would embarrass Tom.
There's a reason why I don't do that the way Tom does.
If you think this movie is boring, we can turn it off.
I sometimes enjoy looking at my high school yearbooks.
